entry.title: The Tiptoe Tango
entry.summary:
Author: Jadezdominion

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,631Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 4

Summary: Derek and Stiles had been tiptoeing around one another for far too long. Before he lost Stiles to a four-year university on the East Coast, he had to make his intentions clear. Derek was an Alpha and a werewolf after all, not a tiptoeing were-coyote like his cousin, Malia. It was time to take this step.

entry.title: So shut your eyes, kiss me goodbye and sleep
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,438Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: The city sprawls beneath them, lights flickering over lives unaware of the silence above.A boy who has touched death. A man who refuses to let go.They move through the night, hand in hand, alive and not alive, bound by something the void envies.Shadows cling to their steps. The streets, the buildings, the indifferent city — it all fades before the quiet between them.What does it mean to be free when freedom has no weight? To love someone who no longer fully belongs to this world?They rise, surrendering not to falling, but to an intimacy beyond flesh and fear.In the space where light and sound dissolve, there is only this: a shared certainty stronger than life, more eternal than death.At the edge of everything, they are no longer living, no longer dead, only together.

entry.title: His Guardian Angel
entry.summary:
Author: sterektaboosmut

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,480Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 16

Summary: I've always had an overprotective streak when it comes to my younger brother, Stiles. He's as sweet as they come. Innocent as hell, or should I say, Heaven. He's in his first year of college, away from home, away from me. Surrounded by hundreds of horny students, waiting for the perfect time to take advantage of him. I know, because everyone wants him.If I didn't keep an eye on him, someone would take him, make him their own. And I can't let that happen. I have to make sure he stays pure, make sure he saves himself for a man that's worthy of him. But there's only one person who can take Stiles.He is mine, he just doesn't know it yet. He may be far from me, but I'm always watching over him. Like his guardian angel. Because I love him. And when he needs me, I need to make sure I'm there, ready for anything.No one will touch what's mine.Stiles won't let it.I won't let it.

entry.title: The Recipe for Life
entry.summary:
Author: PeterChristensen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 64,329Chapters: 10/12Kudos: 60

Summary: Stiles is the engine that runs Doughboy, the chaotic little bakery he built from his late mother’s treasured recipes, but the stress of keeping her memory alive, 16-hour days, 6 days a week, has started to take its toll. To make matters worse, when the town's Chamber of Commerce pressures him into a cooking competition for their latest viral marketing stunt, he’s partnered with the last person he’d ever choose. Derek Hale, the world-traveled trust-fund baby and brooding Gordan Ramsey wannabe.Derek, a professional chef who's still struggling with the recent passing of his sister, is the last living Hale to uphold a world-class culinary legacy. While returning to Beacon Hills, his childhood hometown, he opens his flagship restaurant, Hales, as an honor to the memory of his late family. But now he's stuck with Stiles Stilinski, the hot mess from the Doughboy bakery, who's stuck in the past and refuses to join the present, as a partner in a viral cooking competition that could make or break his new restaurant's success.Sparks fly as flour meets foie gras, and their rivalry in the culinary scene threatens to ignite into something far messier, and far more irresistible, than either expected.

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,190Chapters: 12/12Kudos: 136

entry.title: LIKE THE COMING OF SPRING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,011Chapters: 22/36Kudos: 1

Summary: Three months after leaving to attend Berkeley, Stiles receives a phone call. Twelve years later; Stiles and Derek's son, Eli, is eager to help when a new enemy emerges. The nemeton has been quieted, but things never remain silent forever. When a demonic force threatens the peace in Beacon Hills, the Hale pack must prove that they are stronger than ever.Or;You are in the backyard, lying in the grass. The sun is high and hot. The light is painting the darkness behind your eyes into a vermillion. “You know what you have to do, right?” Laura asks. Last you saw she was filling a wading pool, but the water has stopped running through the hose and as she moves you can hear it sloshing around her shins.“No clue,” you answer. Laura laughs. You've missed that sound so much, and it makes you think about how long it took you after your family died to laugh again. “Last time we spoke you said my grief was too quiet… but it's been a while since I lost anyone.”You hear the water slosh two more times as she steps out of the pool. She walks over to you and stands so close to your arm that you can feel how cold the water is from her feet.“Who says grief must be fresh to be felt?”

entry.title: What Would You Do Without Me?
entry.summary:
Author: Logan_readss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 54,107Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 1,398

Summary: Finally, everything in Beacon Hills has settled down. Scott chose to leave his home in order to go to university but Stiles knows better than to do that, knows that Beacon Hills needs him. He chooses to study online in favour of remaining in his childhood home to care for his father and the rest of his pack that Scott has abandoned. Little does he know how much trouble the pack is really in, lacking in the structure and form that other packs have due to Scott's inexperience and Deaton's poor guidance.But he's going to fix it, he always does. That's his job.

entry.title: To Survive a Serial Killer
entry.summary:
Author: DarkScarlette

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,768Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 29

Summary: Stiles never planned to stay in Beacon Hills, but something about Derek’s empty loft made it impossible to leave. Now working as a consultant for the Sheriff’s department, he’s drawn into a chilling case. The investigation takes a personal turn when Derek suddenly returns, bloody and broken, with wounds that match the killer’s victims.With Derek back, and no clear idea what they’re up against, the pack is forced to regroup. As Stiles, Scott, Lydia, and the others race to unravel the mystery, old emotions resurface, secrets unravel, and survival becomes anything but guaranteed.Whatever this killer is, it’s not human—and it’s just getting started.

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,595Chapters: 16/19Kudos: 595

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.” Stiles stares at him. “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?” “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away. Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.title: LIKE THUNDER BETWEEN LIGHTNING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,637Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 1

Summary: Following the defeat of the omega pack, Erica and Boyd reflect on their relationship, the pack bonds, and the nature of love. However, the fight is far from over and the pack has made many powerful enemies. With the return of Deucalion, a litany of revenge plots threaten the hopeful peace they'd found. High School is so complicated, even without the threat of death hanging above them.Or;The living room still smells like bleach. The bodies of Malcolm and Bonnie are buried out deep in the preserve. You take a sip of the soda from the theater and shake the ice around the bottom of the cup idly. “I have a really bad feeling,” you say as you walk up the stairs. You follow Boyd into his room and collapse on the bed.“You still stuck on the Marcie thing?” he asks, and you nod.“It's not just that, though. Something is coming… I just know it.”

entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,373Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 9

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcases in the living room. Beside the photo, in thick marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back out of pure spite. But in the corner, tiny letters catch his eye: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does.The next page has the present date scribbled in the corner and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone.I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest.Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf.We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. Derek runs a thumb over it in disbelief.---What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,877Chapters: 28/75Kudos: 32

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.
